verses.1: “Mawhna hanga biakna ngeina, a siangtho pen hih bang ahi hi.
verses.2: Amaute in meihal biakna a gawhna mun uh ah mawhna hanga biakna go ding uh a, biakna tau kimkot ah a si kitheh ding hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin a thau khempeuh, a meithau, a gilpi tuam a thau,
verses.4: a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte kipia ding hi.
verses.5: Topaʼ tungah meihal biakna-in siampipa in biakna tau tungah hal dinga, tua pen mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
verses.6: Siampite lakah pasal peuhmah in a siangtho mun khat ah ne thei ding uh hi; tua in a siangtho pen ahi hi.
verses.7: “Mawhna hanga biakna pen khialhna hanga biakna tawh kibang a, tuate ading a ngeina a kibang hi dinga, kilemna a bawlsak siampipa in tua biakna sa ngah ding hi.
verses.8: Mi khatpeuhʼ meihal biakna a piaksak siampipa in ama piaksak tua meihal biakna a vun ngah ding hi.
verses.9: Mei bung sunga a ki-em an tawh biakna peuhmah leh sikbeel daii ahi a, beelpei tungah ahi zongin a kibawl khempeuhte, a pia siampipa in ngah ding hi.
verses.10: An tawh biakna khempeuh, sathau a kihel hitaleh a kihel lo hitaleh, Aaronʼ suan khempeuh in a kikimin hawm ding uh hi.
verses.11: “Mi khatpeuh in Topaʼ tungah a piak theih ding, thunuam a biakna ngeina hih bang ahi hi.
verses.12: Amah in lungdam kohna-in a piak leh, silngo sawh loh sathau tawh a kihel moh, silngo sawh loh mohpheng sathau tawh a kizut, annel moh sathau limtakin a kihelte, lungdam biakna tawh pia khawm ding hi.
verses.13: Amah in lungdam koh nadingin thunuam a ama biakpiakna tawh silngo kisawh anlum mohte ama biakna-in paipih khawm ding hi.
verses.14: Amah in Topa biak nadingin tua biakna sung panin moh khat ciat pia ding a, thunuam a biakna si a theh siampipa in tua moh ngah ding hi.
verses.15: Lungdam kohna-in thunuam a ama biakpiakna a sa pen a piak ni-in kine dinga, a zingsang dong bangmah kisit lo ding hi.
verses.16: “Ahih hangin ama biakpiakna pen thuciamna hanga biakpiakna ahi a, utthu-a biakpiakna ahi zongin ahihleh, amah in a biakpiakna a piak ni-in kine dinga, a om lai teng a zing ciangin kine ding hi.
verses.17: Ahih hangin a ni thum ni-in biakpiakna sa a om lai teng mei tawh kihal ding hi.
verses.18: A ni thum ni-in thunuam a ama biakpiakna sa khat peuhpeuh a kinek leh, tua biakpiakna a pia pa kisang lo dinga, tua pen ama aʼ in zong kiciamteh lo ding hi. Tua sa a nin hi dinga, a ne pa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
verses.19: “A nin na khat peuhpeuh tawh a kisawh kha sa kine lo dinga, mei tawh kihal ding hi. Ahi zongin a siang mi khempeuh in a sa ne thei ding uh hi.
verses.20: A nin hi napi-in thunuam a Topaʼ tungah biakpiakna sa a ne pa ama mipihteʼ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.
verses.21: Mi khatpeuh in mihing nin hitaleh ganhing nin hitaleh a kihhuai a nin khat peuhpeuh hitaleh lawng a, tua khit ciangin thunuam a Topaʼ tungah biakpiakna sa a nek leh, ama mipihteʼ lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.23: “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi a, keel ahi zongin a thau na ne kei ding uh hi.
verses.24: A mawk sih ganhing thau leh gamsate in a bal gawp ganhing thaute, na dangin kizang thei dinga, ahih hangin bangbang hileh na ne kei ding uh hi.
verses.25: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topaʼ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ganhing thau a ne mi peuhmah ama mipihteʼ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.
verses.26: Tua tham loin note in na teenna uh mun khat peuhpeuh ah vasa sisan hitaleh ganhing sisan hitaleh si peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi.
verses.27: Si khat peuhpeuh a ne mi peuhmah ama mipihteʼ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.29: “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Topaʼ tungah thunuam a ama biakpiakna a pia pa in Topaʼ kiangah ama biakna paipih ding hi. Thunuam a ama biakpiakna panin
verses.30: amah in Topaʼ tungah meihal biakna a khutin paipih ding hi. Topaʼ mai ah vei-a biak nadingin a iik a kivei theih nadingin amah in a thau a iik tawh paipih ding hi.
verses.31: Siampipa in biakna tau tungah a thau hal dinga, ahih hangin a iik pen Aaron le a suante ading hi ding hi.
verses.32: Thunuam a na biakpiakna panin biakna-in siampipa tungah a taklam phei na pia ding uh hi.
verses.33: Aaronʼ suante sung panin thunuam a biakna si le a thau a pia pa in a taklam phei a ngah ding ahi hi.
verses.34: Bang hang hiam cih leh a kivei a iik le a kipia a phei pen keimah in Israel miteʼ tung panin thunuam a amauʼ biakpiakna sung panin la khia-in, Israel miteʼ tung panin a tawntungin a ngah dingun siampi Aaron le a suanteʼ tungah ka pia khinzo hi.
verses.35: Hih pen, Topaʼ siampi na a sem dingin amaute a kipiak ni-in, Topaʼ tungah meihal biakna sung panin amauʼ tungah a kipia, Aaron leh a suanteʼ tanh ahi hi.
verses.36: Israel mite in amaute tungah a piak nadingin amaute sathau a kinilh ni-in Topa in hih thu pia a, tua pen a khang tawntungun amauʼ kaih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.37: Hihte pen amauʼ biaknate Topaʼ tungah a piak nadingun amah in Israel mite Sinai sehnel gamah a thupiak ni-in Topa in Sinai Mual tungah Moses a thupiak, meihal biakna, an tawh biakna, khialhna hanga biakna, mawhna hanga biakna, ki-apna le thunuam a biakna ngeina ahi hi.
